Double-Click on 'PG.jar' to run the program.

If nothing shows up, download and install
Java JDK 5.0 Update 6 and Java JRE 5.0 Update 6
from http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.5.0/download.jsp

If you Java installed properly and 'PG.jar' still fails to display anything, try double-clicking on 'Run Program.bat'. If the problem persists, please contact the person who sent this build to you.

For testing purposes, a demo profile has been provided. Please use 'demo' as userid and 'guest' as password to load this profile.
